description: T.1 Oak - Lift crown to 2.5m to 3.0m to facilitate movement beneath the tree and cut back excess twigs growth to prevent large leaves fallout. Reduce pollards to a height acceptable to reduce excessive growth. Reduce back lower major limbs extending over the grass area to reduce leaves cover during summer months and to reduce end weight loading of extended branch hanging over the garage roof and reduce fall of twigs and branches over the road in normal windy times.
decision_conditions: T.1 Oak - Holistic crown reduction to previous points (approx 2m of regrowth), 10% crown thin of tertiary growth & removal of deadwood.
